Body.Content:
We are announcing the integration of Power Fx scripting with Power Automate for desktop. This feature will reach general availability on November 30, 2024.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, users can utilize Power Fx, the low-code language for expressing logic across Microsoft Power Platform using human-friendly text. Users can now create automation flows using Power Fx scripting.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

For more information on this feature, please visit Power Fx in desktop flows.
